channel.title: 2006 PKing - Crazy-PVP [ECONOMY] [AWESOME COMBAT] [NOTHING ABOVE 317 REVISION]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/n1qdg9.png[/img]
forums: [url=http://www.crazy-pvp.com/forum/]Crazy PvP - Index[/url] download (less than 1mb!): [url=http://www.crazy-pvp.com/crazypvp.jar]http://www.crazy-pvp.com/crazypvp.jar[/url] webclient: not available
What is Crazy PVP?
Crazy PVP is a server focused on the 06 era of PKing. The exp rate is 30x the regular rate and you can type pure to get your account started a bit. This server is capable of holding 100+ players without lag and there's much to do on here without losing interest.
Features:
2006-like Server! No items passed the 2006 year! Clipped following, NPCs, PKing, projectiles Dupe-free! The economy stays fresh! Amazing combat! Nearly all skills work! Lag free! Mature community and staff! No grinding! Doesn't take 5 days to get a 99
Media:
Home- [IMG]http://s15.postimage.org/70awmzhbv/image.png[/img]
Tztok Jad, only 1 wave! - [IMG]http://s15.postimage.org/w7lsn8kfv/image.png[/img]
Clipped combat! - [IMG]http://s7.postimage.org/lzjeusiuz/image.png[/img]
So what are you waiting for? Come on and join the server! [/CENTER]

item.title: 2006 PKing - Crazy-PVP [ECONOMY] [AWESOME COMBAT] [NOTHING ABOVE 317 REVISION]
item.dc:creator: @irKevin irKevin
item.description:
@irKevin wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:6, topic:459193”][quote author=irKevin link=topic=562097.msg4099220#msg4099220 date=1347236532]

Looks like one of those server that I’d play for a couple days, max everything out, then never play again.

Those couple of days could be a great couple of days! Haha

That’s not the point, though.
What’s the base you’ve used?

How is that not the point

Project Insanity
[/quote]

The point is how the server lacks things to do. As tyb said, I could log in, max out, and get bored. Then I’d most likely leave.
This is based off of PI and you’re saying 100% dupe-free? I don’t want to doubt you, but you have to check every single dupe available. There’s packet dupes, trade dupes, duel arena dupes, even drop item dupes. A magic packet has a dupe as well… and the list goes on.[/quote]

Well as a server owner, I’d like to believe that it’s 100% dupe-free. Dropping disappears, duel arena dupes are fixed, trade dupes are fixed from the dupes I’ve tried, xlogging is fixed, cheat clients are fixed.

Second, this thread doesn’t show all the server content, which is my fault but that still makes my point relevant because all I’m saying is that this thread is to get players to play, long term or short term, and if he decides to leave after a few days, well hey, at least he had the chance to try and have fun? Plus that’s not considering the fact of whether or not he gave the community a chance. Someone could have the mindset that they’ll get tired of this easily, but when they login and interact with the players well, they might stay.

Read full topic

Those couple of days could be a great couple of days! Haha

[/quote]

How is that not the point

Project Insanity[/quote]

The point is how the server lacks things to do. As tyb said, I could log in, max out, and get bored. Then I’d most likely leave.
This is based off of PI and you’re saying 100% dupe-free? I don’t want to doubt you, but you have to check every single dupe available. There’s packet dupes, trade dupes, duel arena dupes, even drop item dupes. A magic packet has a dupe as well… and the list goes on.
